S04n260:90: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati ||
S04n260:102: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavati ||
S04n260:229: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca |
S04n260:230: śrotrasaṃsparśajā vedanā sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca |
S04n260:231: ghrāṇasaṃsparśajā vedanā sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca |
S04n260:232: jihvāsaṃsparśajā vedanā sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca |
S04n260:233: kāyasaṃsparśajā vedanā sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca |
S04n260:234: manaḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca |
S04n260:319: yā teṣāṃ teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tasmiṃstasmin sattvanikāye jātiḥ,
S04n260:329: nikāyasabhāgatāyāstasyā yat khālityaṃ pālityaṃ valīpracuratā jīrṇatā bhugnatā kub jagopānasīvakratā khurukhuruśvāsapraśvāsaśca tilakālakopahatagātratā purataḥ prāgbhārakāyatā daṇḍāvaṣṭambhatā indriyāṇāṃ paripākaḥ paribhedaḥ saṃbhārāṇāṃ purāṇībhāvo jarjarībhāvaḥ dhandhatvaṃ mandatvaṃ hāniḥ parihāṇiḥ |
S04n260:332: yatteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tasmācchavikāyāccyutiḥ cyavanatā bhedo'ntardhānaṃ maraṇaṃ kālakriyā āyuṣo hāniḥ uṣmaṇo hāniḥ jīvitendriyasya nirodhaḥ skandhānāṃ nikṣepaḥ |
S04n260:354: yadapītthaṃ paryeṣyamāṇaṃ na labhyate tadapi duḥkham |
S04n260:361: yadasyā eva tṛṣṇāyāḥ paunarbhavikyā nandīrāgasahagatāyāstatratatrābhinandinyā aśeṣataḥ prahāṇaṃ pratiniḥsargo vyayībhāvaḥ kṣayo virāgo nirodho vyupaśamo'staṃgamaḥ,
S04n260:366: tadyathā-kaścitpuruṣo jvarābhibhūtaḥ kuśalasaṃpaddṛṣṭakarmāṇaṃ śrutaśāstraṃ vaidyamupasaṃkramya kathayedevam-jvare'śāntibhūto'smi |
S04n260:368: sa tasya bhiṣak prāṅ nidānaṃ pṛcchet-kiṃ tvayā bhuktaṃ pītaṃ ceti |
S04n260:369: āturastasya kathayet-mayā hi dadhi trapuṣaṃ bhakṣitam,
S04n260:372: evameva jātyādimahājvarasaṃtāpitāḥ sādhavo mahācittabhiṣajaṃ mahākāruṇikaṃ nāthaṃ tathāgatamupasaṃkramya duḥkhajvarāpahaṃ dharmaṃ pṛccheyuḥ |
S04n260:373: tebhyo bhagavān nidānaṃ samudayākhyāmākhyāya āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo mahauṣadhaṃ śāntikaraṃ nirvāṇamupadiśet |
S04n260:374: kleśāturo'pyenaṃ mārgaṃ bhāvayan nacirātsarvaduḥkhakṣayamavāpya nirvāṇapuraṃ gatvā pariśāntimavāpnotīti ||
S04n260:431: rājakathā caurakathā dyūtakathā madyakathā strīkathā ākhyāyikākathā |
S04n260:435: paradravyasvīkaraṇecchayā anyasya dravyāṇi tāniḥ mama syuritīyamucyate abhidhyā ||
S04n260:445: bhikṣostāvat kuhanā lapanā naimittikatvaṃ naiṣpeṣikatvaṃ lābhena lābhapratikāṅkṣā samyagājīvaḥ |
S04n260:448: bhikṣurdānapatiṃ dṛṣṭvā paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā pathi śūnyāgāre niṣīdati dhyāyī-bhikṣurarhanniti lābhasatkāro me bhaviṣyati,
S04n260:456: bhikṣustāvat piṇḍapātraṃ paribhuktvā sakṛdasakṛd yad brūte-yādṛśo'yaṃ piṇḍapātaḥ,
S04n260:461: bhikṣustāvad yatra gṛhe piṇḍapātraṃ na labhate,
S04n260:469: bhikṣustāvadātmīyena dhanena śobhanānicīvarāṇi copakrīya upāsakebhyo darśayati-īdṛśāni vayaṃ vastrāṇi dānapatibhyo labhāmahe iti |
S04n260:475: iha khalu bhikṣavaḥ upāsakasya mithyājīvaḥ katamaḥ ?
S04n260:489: iha khalu bhikṣavo bhikṣuḥ striyaṃ dṛṣṭvā utpanne rāge bāhyātmikayoḥ śarīrayoraśubhākāreṇa yathābhūtadarśī bhavati-santyasmin kāye keśā romāṇi nakhā dantā rajomalatvaṅmāṃsam,
S04n260:491: maka āmāśayaḥ pakkāśayaḥ antrāṇi antraguṇā odarīyakaṃ yakṛt parīṣamaśru svedaḥ khelakaḥ siṃghāṇako vasā lasīkā majjā medaḥ pittaṃ śleṣmā pūyaṃ śoṇitaṃ mastakaluṅgamuccāraprasravaiḥ pūrṇaṃ nānāprakārakamaśuciriti |
S04n260:495: iha bhikṣavo bhikṣuḥ viviktaṃ kāmaiḥ viviktaṃ pāpakairakuśalairdharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamadhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati |
S04n260:496: sa vitarkavicāravyupaśamādadhyātmasaṃprasādāccetasa ekotibhāvādavitarkamavicāraṃ samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyadhyānamupasaṃpadyaṃ viharati |
S04n260:498: sukhaṃ ca kāyena pratisaṃvedayate-yattadāryā ācakṣate upekṣakaḥ smṛtimān sukhavihārī-tṛtīyaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati |
S04n260:499: sa sukhasya ca prahāṇādduḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt pūrvameva ca saumanasyadaurmanasyayorastaṃgamādaduḥkhāsukhamupekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ caturthadhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati |
S04n260:504: yaduta cakṣurindriyaṃ śrotrendriyaṃ ghrāṇendriyaṃ jihvendriyaṃ kāyendriyaṃ manendriyaṃ puruṣendriyaṃ strīndriyaṃ duḥkhendriyaṃ sukhendriyaṃ saumanasyendriyaṃ daurmanasyendriyaṃ upekṣendriyaṃ śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ jñānendriyaṃ jīvitendriyam,
S04n260:510: iha bhikṣavo bhikṣurviviktaṃ kāmaiḥ viviktaṃ pāpakairakuśalairdharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati |
S04n260:511: sa vitarkavicārāṇāṃ vyupaśamādadhyātmasaṃprasādāccetasa ekotibhāvādavitarkamavicāraṃ samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati |
S04n260:514: sukhaṃ kāyena pratisaṃvedayate-yattadāryā ācakṣate upekṣakaḥ smṛtimān sukhavihārī-tṛtīyaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati |
S04n260:515: sa sukhasya ca prahāṇādduḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt pūrvameva saumanasyadaurmanasyayorastaṃgamāda duḥkhāsukhamupekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati ||
S04n260:518: iha bhikṣavo bhikṣurmaitrīsahagatena cittena avaireṇa asaṃpannena avyābādhena vipulena mahadgatena apramāṇena subhāvitena ekādrisamaṃ vimucya sphuritvā upasaṃpadya viharati,
S04n260:522: iti ūrdhvamadhastiryak sarvaśaḥ sarvāvantamimaṃ lokaṃ maitrīsahagatena cittena avaireṇa asaṃpannena avyābādhena vipulena mahadgatena advayena apramāṇena subhāvitena ekāṃ diśamadhimucya sphuritvā upasaṃpadya viharati |
S04n260:525: upekṣāsahagatena cittena avaireṇa asaṃpannena avyābādhena vipulena mahadgatena advayena apramāṇena subhāvitena ekāṃ diśamadhimucya sphuritvā upasaṃpadya viharati |
S04n260:532: tatra katamā sā duḥkhā pratipad dhandhābhijñā ?
S04n260:539: tasyemāni pañca lokottarāṇi indriyāṇi dhandhāni bhavanti mṛdūni saśīghravāhīni |
S04n260:541: yaduta śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyam |
S04n260:542: sa eṣāṃ pañcānāṃ lokottarāṇamindriyāṇāṃ mṛdutvādaśīghravāhitvācca dhandhamevānantaryasamādhiṃ spṛśati yaduta āsravāṇāṃ kṣayāya |
S04n260:551: tasyemāni pañca lokottarāṇi indriyāṇi adhimātrāṇi bhavanti tīkṣṇāni śīghravāhīni |
S04n260:553: yaduta śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyam |
S04n260:554: sa eṣāṃ pañcānāṃ lokottarāṇāmindriyāṇāmadhimātratvācchīghravāhitvācca kṣipramevānantaryaṃ samādhiṃ spṛśati yaduta āsravāṇāṃ kṣayāya |
S04n260:562: tasyemāni pañca lokottarāṇīndriyāṇi dhandhāni bhavanti mṛdūni na tīkṣṇāni na śīghravāhīni |
S04n260:564: yaduta śraddhendriyaṃ vīryandriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyaṃ |
S04n260:565: sa eṣāṃ pañcānāmindriyāṇāṃ dhandhātvānmṛdutvādaśīghravāhitvācca dhandhamevānantaryaṃ samādhiṃ spṛśati yadutāsravāṇāṃ kṣayāya |
S04n260:575: yaduta śraddendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyam |
S04n260:576: sa eṣāṃ pañcānāmindriyāṇāmadhimātratvāt tīkṣṇatvācchīghravāhitvācca kṣipramevānantaryaṃ samādhiṃ spṛśati yaduta āsravāṇāṃ kṣayāya |
S04n260:580: ...........asti bhikṣavaḥ samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā jñānadarśanapratilābhāya saṃvartate |
S04n260:581: asti samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā prajñāpratilambhāya saṃvartate |
S04n260:582: tatra katamā samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā kāmarāgaprahāṇāya saṃvartate ?
S04n260:583: iha bhikṣavo bhikṣu rimameva kāyamūrdhvaṃ pādatalādadhaḥ keśamastakādiparyantaṃ yathāsthitaṃ tathāpraṇihitaṃ pūrṇaṃ nānāprakārasyāśuceryathābhūtaṃ samyak prajñayā pratyavekṣate-yaduta ayaṃ kāyaḥ anupūrveṇa samudāgato'pūrvavināśī paramāṇusaṃcayaḥ suṣira unnāmonnāmanānmānavavraṇasumukharomakūpasrāvī valmīkavadāśīviṣanivāsaḥ |
S04n260:628: punaraparaṃ bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā idaṃ śarīramādyuttarakāraṇataḥ parīkṣitavyam |
S04n260:634: pittāśayaṃ prāpya pacyamāna uṣṇībhūtvā vāyvāśayaṃ gacchati |
S04n260:635: paktvā vāyvāśayaṃ prāpto vāyunā vibhajyate pṛthak malaḥ,
S04n260:644: tadevamādyuttarakāraṇādaśuci śarīramiti paśyatā bhikṣuṇā idaṃ śarīraṃ navabhirasthiśataiḥ saṣaṣṭhaiḥ samucchritaṃ kudārugṛhavat tribhiḥ śatvisa(?)
S04n260:652: saptottareṇa marmaśatena bhinnabhājanamiva jarjareṇa koṭīśatasahasrairaśītibhiśca tṛṇavacchannam,
S04n260:671: kevalaṃ yācitakabhāṇḍamiva kṣaṇaprayojanārthaṃ śakaṭamiva bhārodvahanāya dharmabuddhinā boddha(voḍha)vyam ||
S04n260:676: priyaprakāraṃ vahatenāyat drakṣanvivaktuṃ vahate sadā ca |
S04n260:677: kāyaḥ sucokṣaḥ kṛmivacca jantoḥ kuto'tra rāgo bahumānatā vā ||
S04n260:679: tadyathā bhikṣava ubhayato dvāravinirmuktaḥ koṣṭhāgāraḥ pūrṇo nānāprakārajātasya dhānyatilasarṣapamudgayavamāṣāṇām |
S04n260:682: evameva bhikṣavo bhikṣurimameva kāyaṃ yathāsthitaṃ yathāpraṇihitaṃ yāvat pratyavekṣate |
S04n260:683: iyaṃ samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bahulīkṛtā kāmarāgaprahāṇāya saṃvartate |
S04n260:684: tatra bhikṣavaḥ katamā samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya saṃvartate?
S04n260:685: iha bhikṣavo bhikṣuraraṇyagato vā vṛkṣamūlagato vā śūnyāgāragato vā imameva kāyamadhyātmaṃ pratyātmaṃ vivekāt na prītisukhenābhiṣyandayati,
S04n260:689: tasya nāsti sarvataḥ kāyādasphuṭaṃ bhavatyaspharaṇīyaṃ yaduta adhyātmajaṃ vivekajena prītisukhena |
S04n260:690: tadyathāpi nāma bhikṣavaḥ utpalāni vā padmāni vā kumudāni vā puṇḍarīkāni vā udake jātāni udake magnāni,
S04n260:691: sarvāṇi tāni śītalena vāriṇābhiṣyanditāni pariṣyanditāni paripūritāni pariprīṇitāni parisphuritāni |
S04n260:692: evameva bhikṣuraraṇyagato vā vṛkṣamūlagato vā śūnyāgāragato vā imameva kāyamadhyātmaṃ pratyātmaṃ vivekajena prītisukhenābhiṣyandayati pariṣyandayati paripūrayati parisphurayati pariprīṇayati,
S04n260:693: tasya nāsti sarvataḥ kāyamasphuṭaṃ bhavatyaspharaṇīyaṃ yaduta adhyātmakaṃ vivekajena prītisukhena |
S04n260:694: iyaṃ samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā dṛṣṭadharma(sukha)
S04n260:696: tatra bhikṣavaḥ katamā samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā jñānadarśanena pratilābhāya saṃvartate?
S04n260:697: iha bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā ālokasaṃjñā sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca parigṛhītā bhavati sumanasi kṛtā sudṛṣṭā supratibaddhā ca divasasaṃjñādhiṣṭhitaṃ samaprabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāvayati yathā divā tathā rātrau,
S04n260:702: yathaivordhva tathā adhaḥ-iti vivṛtena cetasā parya(va)
S04n260:704: tadyathāpi nāma bhikṣavo grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse vyabhre dine vigatabalāhake nabhasi madhyāhnakālasamaye ālokapariśuddho bhavati paryavadātaprabhāsvaraḥ, na tasmā(?)
S04n260:706: evameva bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā ālokasaṃjñā sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca sugṛhīto bhavati aśṛṃṣṭā supratibandhonavamasaṃjñā-vesthitā(?)
S04n260:707: samaprabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāvayati yathā divā tathā rātrau yathā rātrau tathā divā,
S04n260:710: yathaivordhvaṃ tathaivādho yathaivādhastathaivordhvamiti vivṛtena cetasā aparyavanaddhena divasasaṃjñādhiṣṭhitena samaprabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāvayati |
S04n260:711: iyaṃ samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā jñānadarśanapratibhānalābhāya saṃvartate ||
S04n260:713: dhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā prajñāpratilambhāya saṃvartate?
S04n260:714: iha bhikṣuraraṇyagato vā vṛkṣamūlagato vā śūnyāgāragato vā sukhasya (duḥkhasya)
S04n260:715: ca prahāṇāt pūrvameva saumanasyadaurmanasyayorastaṃgamādaduḥkhāsukhamupekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati |
S04n260:716: iyaṃ samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā prajñāpratilambhāya saṃvartate ||
S04n260:719: iha bhikṣavo bhikṣuradhyātmaṃ kāye kāyānudarśī viharati ātāpī saṃprajānan smṛtimān vinīya loke abhidhyādaurmanasye |
S04n260:721: adhyātmabahirdhā kāye kāyānudarśī viharati ātāpī saṃprajānan anusmṛtimān vinīya loke abhidhyādaurmanasye |
S04n260:722: adhyātmavadenāsu bahirdhāvedanāsu adhyātmabahirdhā vedanāsu vedanānudarśī viharati ātāpī saṃprajānan smṛtimān vinīya loke abhidhyādaurmanasye |
S04n260:723: adhyātmacitte bahirdhācitte adhyātmabahirdhā cittānudarśī viharati ātāpī saṃprajānan smṛtimān vinīya loke abhidhyādaurmanasye |
S04n260:724: adhyātmadharmeṣu bahirdhādharmeṣu adhyātmabahirdhādharmeṣu dharmānudarśī viharati ātāpī saṃprajānan smṛtimān vinīya loke abhidhyādaurmanasye |
S04n260:727: iha bhikṣavo bhikṣuranutpannānāṃ pāpakānāmakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmanutpādāya chandaṃ janayati,
S04n260:742: utpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sthitaye bhāvanāyai asaṃmoṣāya aparihāṇāya bhūyobhāvāya vṛddhivipulatāyai pāripūryai chandaṃ janayati,
S04n260:748: iha bhikṣavo bhikṣuḥ chandasamādhiprahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgatamṛddhipādaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇatam |
S04n260:751: cittasamādhiprahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgatamṛddhipādaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇataṃ mā me cittamatilīnaṃ bhaviṣyati nābhigṛhītam || 3 ||
S04n260:753: mīmāṃsāsamādhiprahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgatamṛddhipādaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇataṃ mā me mīmāṃsā nātilīnā bhaviṣyati nābhigṛhītam || 4 ||
S04n260:757: yaduta śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyam |
S04n260:763: yadyadeva karma kariṣyāmi kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā,
S04n260:783: yaduta śraddhābalaṃ vīryabalaṃ smṛtibalaṃ samādhibalaṃ prajñābalam |
S04n260:788: bodhyaṅgaṃ dharmapravicayasaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ gāmbhīryasaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ prītisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ prasrabdhisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ samādhisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ upekṣāsaṃbodhyaṅgam ||
S04n260:789: iha bhikṣavo bhikṣuḥ smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇatam ||
S04n260:790: evaṃ dharmapravicayasaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇatam ||
S04n260:791: vīryasaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇatam ||
S04n260:792: prītisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇatam |
S04n260:793: prasrabdhisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśrita nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇatam ||
S04n260:794: samādhisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇatam ||
S04n260:795: upekṣāsaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇatam ||
S04n260:798: ? tadyathā-samyagdṛṣṭiḥ samyaksaṃkalpaḥ samyagvāk samyakkarmāntaḥ samyagājīvaḥ samyagvyāyāmaḥ samyaksmṛtiḥ samyaksamādhiḥ |
S04n260:801: yā lokottarā nātmadṛṣṭisamutthitā na sa .........najīvan soṣaṇapuruṣanapudgalanamanujanamānavadṛṣṭisamutthitā nocchedaśāśvatadṛṣṭisamutthitā na bhavavibhavadṛṣṭisamutthitā na kuśalāvyākṛtadṛṣṭisamutthitā,
S04n260:811: yayā rāge nātmānaṃ na parāṃśca tāpayati,
S04n260:830: yadārthavaśena guṇasaṃlekhādutsarjanatā na kuhanatā na lapanatā na naiṣpeṣikatā sṛvatāravācāśīlatā(?)
S04n260:842: yā sūpasthitā aprakampyā ṛjukā akuṭilā saṃsāradveṣādīnavadarśikā nirvāṇapathapraṇetrī smṛtiḥ spharaṇaṃ āryamārgāsaṃmoṣaḥ |
S04n260:846: yasmin samādhau sthitaḥ sarvasattvapramokṣāya samyak sthitatvaṃ niyāmamavakrāmati,
S04n260:852: dīrghaṃ vā praśvasan dīrghaṃ praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
S04n260:854: hrasvaṃ vā praśvasan hrasvaṃ praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
S04n260:855: kāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasan kāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
S04n260:856: kāyapratisaṃvedī praśvasan kāyapratisaṃvedī praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
S04n260:857: kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasan kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
S04n260:858: kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasan kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī vā praśvasan yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
S04n260:859: sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasan sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
S04n260:860: kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasan kāyasaṃskārāpratisaṃvedī vā praśvasan yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
S04n260:861: sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasan sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
S04n260:862: sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī praśvasan sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī vā praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
S04n260:865: prasrabhyanti me kāyasaṃskārā āśvasan prasrabhyanti me kāyasaṃskārā āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
S04n260:866: prasrabhyanti me kāyasaṃskārāḥ praśvasan prasrabhyanti me kāyasaṃskārāḥ praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
S04n260:867: prītipratisaṃvedī āśvasan prītipratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
S04n260:870: sukhapratisaṃvedī āśvasan sukhapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ jānāti |
S04n260:871: sukhapratisaṃvedī praśvasan sukhapratisaṃvedī praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
S04n260:872: cittapratisaṃvedī āśvasan cittapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
S04n260:875: cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasan cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
S04n260:876: cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī praśvasan cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
S04n260:879: prasrabhyanti me cittasaṃskārāḥ praśvasan praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
S04n260:880: abhimodati me cittamāśvasan abhimodati me cittamāśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
S04n260:881: abhimodati me cittaṃ praśvasan abhimodati me cittaṃ praśvasāmīti yathā(bhūtaṃ prajānāti) |
S04n260:882: vimucyati me cittamāśvasan vimucyati me cittamāśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
S04n260:884: cyati me cittaṃ praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
S04n260:885: samāhitaṃ me cittamāśvasan samāhitaṃ me cittamāśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
S04n260:886: samāhitaṃ me cittaṃ praśvasan samāhitaṃ me cittaṃ praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
S04n260:887: evamanityānudarśī virāgānudarśī nirodhānudarśī pratiniḥsargānudarśī āśvasan pratiniḥsargānudarśī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
S04n260:888: .........pratiniḥsargānudarśī vā praśvasan pratiniḥsargānudarśī praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
S04n260:891: iha bhikṣavaḥ śrāvako'vetya buddhe prasādena samanvāgato bhavati-ityapi sa bhagavāṃstathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavāniti |
S04n260:892: dharme'vetya prasādena samanvāgato bhavati-svākhyāto bhagavatā dharmaḥ sāṃdṛṣṭiko nirjvaraḥ ākālika aupanāyikaḥ ihapaśyakaḥ pratyātmavedanīyo vijñairyaduta nadanimadanapadheyāsāṃ (?)
S04n260:893: prativinaya ālayasamuddhāto dharmopacchedaḥ śūnyatānupalambhaḥ tṛṣṇākṣayo nirodho nirvāṇam |
S04n260:894: saṃghe'vetya prasādena samanvāgato bhavati-supratipanno bhagavataḥ āryaśrāvakasaṃgho nyāyapratipannaḥ sapratipannaḥ sāmīcipratipanno dharmānudharmapratipanno'nudharmacārī |
S04n260:905: eṣa bhagavataḥ śrāvakasaṃghaḥ śraddhāsaṃpannaḥ śrutasaṃpannaḥ samādhisaṃpannaḥ prajñāsaṃpannaḥ vimuktisaṃpannaḥ vimuktijñānadarśanasaṃpannaḥ āhavanīyaḥ prāhavanīyaḥ añjalīkaraṇīyaḥ sāmīcikaraṇīyaḥ anuttaraṃ puṇyakṣetraṃ darśanīyo lokasya yaduta āryakāntaiḥ śīlaiḥ samanvāgato yāni śīlāni akhaṇḍāni acchidrāṇi adhṛtīni aśabalāni akalmaṣāṇi bhujiṣyāṇi aparāmṛṣṭāni susamastāni vijñapraśastāni jayasaṃpannāni agarhitāni vijñairiti |
S04n260:908: tathāgataḥ sthānaṃ ca sthānato yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
S04n260:920: sa divyena cakṣuṣā atikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa sattvān paśyati cyavamānānupapadyamānānapi |
S04n260:926: ime tvayā dharmā nābhisaṃbuddhā ityatra kaścidvādaṃ samāropayet sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ sadevamānuṣāyām |
S04n260:928: nimittaṃ samanupaśyaṃstathāgato bhagavān kṣemaprāpto abhayaprāpta ārṣabhaṃ sthānaṃ prajānāti |
S04n260:930: brāhmaṃ cakraṃ pravartayati apravartitaṃ śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā kenacidvā punarloke sahadharmeṇeti |
S04n260:931: ye punastathāgatairnāntarāyikā dharmā ākhyātāḥ tānapratisevamānasya nānamantarāyet(?)
S04n260:933: yā vā anena pratipadākhyātā āryā nairyāṇikā hīnāṃ pratiraṣāvamāṇo (?)
S04n260:936: kṣīṇāsravasya satamātmānaṃ pratijānataḥ ime āsravā aparikṣīṇā ityatra kaścidvādamāropayet sadevaloke samārake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ sadevamānuṣāyāṃ nimittamevaṃ na samanupaśyati |
S04n260:937: nimitta(ma)samanupaśyan tathāgataḥ sthāmaprāpto viharati abhayaprāpta āha(rṣa?)
S04n260:940: brāhmaṃ cakraṃ pravartayati apravartitaṃ śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā kenacidvā punarloke sahadharmeṇeti |
S04n260:1002: supratiṣṭhitau pādautathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrvaṃ dṛḍhasamādānatayā nirvṛttam |
S04n260:1003: adhastātpādatalayoścakrāṅkitapā datalatā-tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve parasattvājihmakaraṇatayā nirvṛttam |
S04n260:1004: āyatapādapārṣṇisaṃgatapādatā-tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve mātāpitarau satkṛtya caraṇe śuśrūṣatayābhinirvṛttam |
S04n260:1005: dīrghāṅgulikatā-tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve dharmārakṣāvaraṇaguptikaraṇayā nirvṛttam |
S04n260:1006: jālahastapādatā-tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve parivārābhedanatayā nirvṛttam |
S04n260:1007: mṛdutaruṇahastapādatātathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve vividhaprāvaraṇānnapradānatayā nirvṛttam |
S04n260:1010: kambugrīvatā-tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve glāneṣu vividhabhaiṣajyānnapradānatayā nirvṛttam |
S04n260:1011: siṃhahanutā -tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve kuśalamūlaprayogatayā nirvṛttam |
S04n260:1012: samacatvāriṃśaddantatā-tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve sattvasamāśvāsanaprayogatayā nirvṛttam |
S04n260:1013: aviraladantatā-tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve bhinnasattvasaṃghānatayā nirvṛttam |
S04n260:1014: samadantatā-tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve manāpamaṇipradānatayā nirvṛttam |
S04n260:1015: suśukladantatā-tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve svārakṣitakāyavāṅmanaskarmatayā nirvṛttam |
S04n260:1017: jihvatā-tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrvaṃ satyabhāṣaṇatayā nirvṛttam |
S04n260:1022: abhinīlanetratā-tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve maitravatsattvasaṃrakṣaṇatayā nirvṛttam |
S04n260:1025: sūkṣmacchavitā-tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve dharmasaṃgīticittasaṃrakṣaṇakarmaṇyatayā nirvṛttam |
S04n260:1026: suvarṇavarṇacchavitā-tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve śayyāsanāstaraṇamanāpavacanapradānatayā nirvṛttam |
S04n260:1027: ekaikaromakūpatā-tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve saṃgaṇikāparivarjanatayā nirvṛttam |
S04n260:1029: indranīlakeśatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve sarvaprāṇānukampanatayā nihataloṣṭadaṇḍaśastratayā nirvṛttam |
S04n260:1030: suśuklabhramukhāntarorṇalalāṭatā-tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve varṇārhānāṃ varṇabhāṣaṇatayā nirvṛttam |
S04n260:1031: uṣṇīṣaśiraskatā-tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve gurugauravapraṇāmatayā nirvṛttam |
S04n260:1032: nyagrodhaparimaṇḍalasamantaprāsādikatā-tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve ātmanaḥ parasattvānāṃ ca samādhau niyojanatayā nirvṛttam |
S04n260:1033: śarīrasamantaprāsādikatā-tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve tathāgatabimbakaraṇatayā bhinnastūpapratisaṃskāratayā pareṣāṃ ca bhītānāmāśvāsanasaṃghānatayā ca nirvṛttam |
S04n260:1034: apramāṇaiḥ kuśalamūlaiśca teṣu dharmeṣu vaśavartitvāt tathāgatasya dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni kāye nirvṛttāni ||
S04n260:1037: snigdhanakhāśca uttuṅganakhāśca vṛttāṅgulinakhāśca cittāṅgulayaśca anupūrvāṅgulayaśca gūḍhaśirāśca nirgranthiśirāśca gūḍhagulphāśca siṃhavikrāntagāminaśca nāgavikrāntagāminaśca haṃsavikrāntagāminaśca vṛṣabhavikrāntagāminaśca pradakṣiṇagāminaśca cārugāminaśca avakragātrāśca vṛttagātrāśca anupūrvagātrāśca pṛthugurumaṇḍalāśca paripūrṇavyañjanāśca samakramāśca śucigātrāśca mṛdugātrāśca viśuddhagātrāśca utsadagātrāśca susaṃhatagātrāśca suvibhaktapratyaṅgāśca vitimiraśuddhalocanāśca vṛttakukṣayaśca mṛṣṭakukṣayaśca abhagnakukṣayaśca kṣāmodarāśca gambhīranābhayaśca āvartanābhayaśca samantaprāsādikāśca śucisamācārāśca vyapagatatilakagātrāśca tūlasadṛśasukumārapāṇayaśca snigdhapāṇirekhāśca gambhīrapāṇirekhāśca.....nirekhāśca alpāyatavadanāśca bimbapratibimbaapratibimbadaśanavadanāśca mṛdujihvāśca tāmrajihvāśca gajagarjitajīmūtaghoṣāśca madhuragurumañjusvarāśca vṛttadaṃṣṭrāśca tīkṣṇasamadaṃṣṭrāśca anupūrvadaṃṣṭrāśca tuṅganāsāśca śucināsāśca viśālanayanāśca āyatalekhanāśca vi(kasi)
S04n260:1038: tapadmanayanāśca nīlotpaladalanayanāśca vyāyatapīnacakṣuṣaśca āyatabhruvaśca samaromabhruvaśca snigdhabhruvaśca pīnāyatakarṇāśca samakarṇāśca anupahatakarṇāśca supariṇatalalāṭāśca suparipūrṇāśca bhramarasadṛśakeśāśca vṛttakeśāśca śuklakeśāśca asaṃsuḍhitakeśāśca aparuṣakeśāśca suparikeśāśca śrīvatsasvastikanandyāvartacakravajrapadmamatsyādilāñchanapādatalāśca buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti |
S04n260:1040: yaduktaṃ bhagavatā-dharmaṃ vo bhikṣavo deśayiṣyāmi ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇaṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇaṃ svarthaṃ savyañjanam,
S04n260:1041: kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ prakāśayāmi-yaduta arthaviniścayaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyamiti yato yaduktamidaṃ tat pratyuktam |
S04n260:1045: asmin khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe pañcānāṃ bhikṣuśatānāmāsravebhyaścitāni vimuktāni ||
S04n260:1047: āttamanasaste ca bhikṣavaḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti ||
